trait.name: Pounce
trait.text: If the allosaurus moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the allosaurus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: If the boar takes 7 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Primal Strike

monster.name: Giant Frog (Wild Shape)
monster.skill: Animal Handling +8, Medicine +8, Perception +8, Religion +4, Stealth +3

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The frog can breathe air and water

trait.name: Standing Leap
trait.text: The frog's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
action.text: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
trait.text: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4+3) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.name: Rampage
trait.text: When the hyena reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the hyena can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

monster.name: Giant Octopus (Wild Shape)
monster.skill: Animal Handling +8, Medicine +8, Perception +8, Religion +4, Stealth +5

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
trait.text: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Tentacles
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
action.text: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.text: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.text: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

monster.name: Giant Spider (Wild Shape)
monster.skill: Animal Handling +8, Medicine +8, Perception +8, Religion +4, Stealth +7

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
trait.text: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
trait.text: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.text: The toad can breathe air and water

trait.text: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Swallow
action.text: The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

monster.name: Giant Wolf Spider (Wild Shape)
monster.skill: Animal Handling +8, Medicine +8, Perception +8, Religion +4, Stealth +7

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
trait.text: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
trait.text: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
trait.text: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4+1) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.name: Keen Sight
trait.text: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
trait.text: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The hyena has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The jackal has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The jackal has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackal's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

monster.name: Lion (Wild Shape)
monster.skill: Animal Handling +8, Medicine +8, Perception +8, Religion +4, Stealth +6

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Pounce
trait.text: If the lion moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Running Leap
trait.text: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump up to 25 feet.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
trait.text: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
trait.text: The mule has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Hooves

trait.name: Primal Strike

monster.name: Octopus (Wild Shape)
monster.skill: Animal Handling +8, Medicine +8, Perception +8, Religion +4, Stealth +4

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
trait.text: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Tentacles
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
action.text: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

monster.name: Owl (Wild Shape)
monster.skill: Animal Handling +8, Medicine +8, Perception +8, Religion +4, Stealth +3

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
trait.text: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

If the target is prone, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Mimicry
trait.text: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

monster.name: Spider (Wild Shape)
monster.skill: Animal Handling +8, Medicine +8, Perception +8, Religion +4, Stealth +4

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
trait.text: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
trait.text: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 9 Constitution saving throw or take 2 (1d4) poison damage.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

action.name: Blood Drain
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5 (1d4+3) hit points due to blood loss.

The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the stirge.

trait.name: Primal Strike
trait.text: Your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

trait.name: Pounce

trait.name: Primal Strike

trait.name: Trampling Charge
trait.text: If the horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.
